p: But the history of SARS-CoV-2 has shown us something else: in this attempt to “rationalize” our activities, we have forgotten about infectious diseases. Having nineteen posts directing patients towards 120 consultation rooms mean that every day, if the system works at full efficiency, up to over one thousand patients wait in line, sit on a bench, enter a room, go back to the secretary, make another appointment, and finally wait for transportation to go home.
